sentences.sContent: More men are finding out that the joys of work have been overrated.
sentences.sCn: 更多的男士正发现工作的种种乐趣被高估了。

words.tran: 对…定价过高；定价高于…的购买力

trans.tranCn: 对…估价过高， 对…评价过高
trans.tranOther: If you say that something or someone is overrated, you mean that people have a higher opinion of them than they deserve
